author: gstein
msg: Revamp some CROP functionality to avoid modifying entries in-place in the
hash, and to avoid access batons in some places.
(svn_wc__set_depth): new utility function to set the depth on a directory
(crop_children): take a DB rather than an access baton. don't create a
subpool (but keep the iterpool). use the new set_depth function.
(svn_wc_crop_tree): fetch the parent_entry using get_entry() to avoid
the need for an access baton, and to simplify the lookup. use the new
